name: AeroClub Varese
about: AeroClub Varese, established in 1948, is a premier flight school located at Aeroporto Arturo Ferrarin in Venegono Inferiore, Italy. Evolving from a private club to a leading flight training institution, it offers comprehensive programs for PPL, CPL, and ATPL licenses. With a fleet of 16 aircraft and two state-of-the-art flight simulators, AeroClub Varese is dedicated to producing top-notch pilots. The school boasts over 35 full-time instructors, a certified CAMO and IT.CAO.0001, and a strong partnership with Air Dolomiti. Known for its high-quality training and innovation, AeroClub Varese has a remarkable 95% professional placement rate for its graduates, many of whom now fly for leading airlines such as Ryanair and Wizz Air. Choose AeroClub Varese to build a successful career in aviation.
services:
